definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (I have asked (him) of God; on acc. cf. (late) Ps 137:3);—first son of Jehoiachin and uncle of Zerubbabel acc. to 1Ch 3:17 (cf. v:1Ch 3:18, v:1Ch 3:19); but Z.’s father Hag 1:1, Hag 2:23, Ez Eze 3:2, Eze 3:8, Ne 12:1 (attempts at explain. in Be Kit Benz).—Salaqihl.
